detaileddescription.para: This function takes pre-initialized offload data struct and offload array as inputs. The data is used to fill rest of the offload struct and to construct bicubic splines whose coefficients are stored in re-allocated offload array.

The offload data struct must have the following fields initialized:
B_STS_offload_data.psigrid_n_r
B_STS_offload_data.psigrid_n_z
B_STS_offload_data.psigrid_r_min
B_STS_offload_data.psigrid_r_max
B_STS_offload_data.psigrid_z_min
B_STS_offload_data.psigrid_z_max
B_STS_offload_data.Bgrid_n_r
B_STS_offload_data.Bgrid_n_z
B_STS_offload_data.Bgrid_r_min
B_STS_offload_data.Bgrid_r_max
B_STS_offload_data.Bgrid_z_min
B_STS_offload_data.Bgrid_z_max
B_STS_offload_data.Bgrid_n_phi
B_STS_offload_data.Bgrid_phi_min
B_STS_offload_data.Bgrid_phi_max
B_STS_offload_data.n_axis
B_STS_offload_data.axis_min
B_STS_offload_data.axis_max
B_STS_offload_data.psi0
B_STS_offload_data.psi1
B_STS_offload_data.axis_r
B_STS_offload_data.axis_z

The offload array must contain the following data:
offload_array[ z*Bn_r*Bn_z + j*Bn_r + i] = B_R(R_i, phi_z, z_j) [T]
offload_array[ Bn_r*Bn_z*Bn_phi + z*Bn_r*Bn_z + j*Bn_r + i] = B_phi(R_i, phi_z, z_j) [T]
offload_array[2*Bn_r*Bn_z*Bn_phi + z*Bn_r*Bn_z + j*Bn_r + i] = B_z(R_i, phi_z, z_j) [T]
offload_array[3*Bn_r*Bn_z*Bn_phi + z*psin_r*psin_z + j*psin_r + i] = psi(R_i, phi_z, z_j) [V*s*m^-1]
offload_array[3*Bn_r*Bn_z*Bn_phi + psin_r*psin_z*psin_phi + z] = axis_R(phi_z) [m]
offload_array[3*Bn_r*Bn_z*Bn_phi + psin_r*psin_z*psin_phi + n_axis + z] = axis_z(phi_z) [m]
Sanity checks are printed if data was initialized succesfully.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to offload array which is reallocated here
pointer to pointer to offload array

briefdescription.para: Initialize magnetic field data struct on target.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to data struct on target

memberdef.argsstring: (real *psi, real r, real phi, real z, B_STS_data *Bdata)
memberdef.name: B_STS_eval_psi

parameterdescription.para: pointer where psi [V*s*m^-1] value will be stored
pointer to magnetic field data struct

simplesect.para: Non-zero a5err value if evaluation failed, zero otherwise

memberdef.argsstring: (real psi_dpsi[4], real r, real phi, real z, B_STS_data *Bdata)
memberdef.name: B_STS_eval_psi_dpsi

briefdescription.para: Evaluate poloidal flux psi and its derivatives.

parameterdescription.para: pointer for storing psi [V*s*m^-1] and its derivatives
pointer to magnetic field data struct

simplesect.para: Non-zero a5err value if evaluation failed, zero otherwise

memberdef.argsstring: (real rho_drho[4], real r, real phi, real z, B_STS_data *Bdata)

briefdescription.para: Evaluate normalized poloidal flux rho and its derivatives.

parameterdescription.para: pointer where rho and its derivatives will be stored
pointer to magnetic field data struct

simplesect.para: Non-zero a5err value if evaluation failed, zero otherwise

memberdef.argsstring: (real B[3], real r, real phi, real z, B_STS_data *Bdata)

pointer to magnetic field data struct

simplesect.para: Non-zero a5err value if evaluation failed, zero otherwise

briefdescription.para: Evaluate magnetic field and its derivatives.

pointer to magnetic field data struct
